description: Read about a mysterious metal tube's 4,000km journey and the surfers brave enough to crack it open.
title: North Pole time capsule washes up on Irish coast
title_page: North Pole time capsule washes up on Irish coast - BBC News
maintext: Speaking via Zoom, she told them the capsule was placed in the Arctic ice and that it must have melted and travelled the massive distance over the two years.
